attributes.action: Charge foreign motorists, foreign lorry drivers and foreign coach drivers to drive on UK roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foreign motorists can come to the UK and drive freely around our road network, I suggest we charge them at a rate of £20 per week (cars) £60 per week for all HGV / comercial vehicles for use of our roads.
Longer duration stays should enter into the car tax scheme as a normal UK citizen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
